What you do matters.

As an AGFinancial customer, your financial decisions fund real ministry work, transforming lives—yours included.

See how we connect faith & finances

Loans

Demand Certificates are variable rate investments that provide access to funds on demand (within 30 days). Minimum investment $250.

Get loanin

Investments

Term Certificates have fixed or variable interest rates over a predetermined amount of time, ranging from three months to ten years. Minimum investment $500.

Invest

Retirement

Term Certificates have fixed or variable interest rates over a predetermined amount of time, ranging from three months to ten years. Minimum investment $500.

Let’s explore what we can do together.

“Their experience has been a game-changer for us.”

—Rich Wilkerson Jr, Vous Church

“Our 120-acre center for ministry for children and rural pastors wouldn’t be here today had it not been for the creative ways that AGFinancial can help leverage people’s resources.”

—Bryan Jarrett, Lead Pastor, Northplace Church, TX

“We feel like we’re part of the good work AGFinancial is doing.”

—Mike, Donor Advised Fund Corporate Client

Testimonials found on this site are examples of what we have done for other clients, and what some of our clients have said about us. However, we cannot guarantee the results in any case. Your results may vary and every situation is different. No compensation was provided for these testimonials.
